feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Snow mixed with rain late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending late this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NDT Friday 29 April 2016
